solution_line_template: Twice the number of bottles Paul drinks in one day is {paul_drinks_per_day} * {multiplier_twice} = <<{paul_drinks_per_day}*{multiplier_twice}={twice_paul_drinks}>>{twice_paul_drinks} bottles.

So, the number of bottles that Donald drinks in one day is {twice_paul_drinks} + {donald_more_than_twice} = <<{twice_paul_drinks}+{donald_more_than_twice}={donald_drinks_per_day}>>{donald_drinks_per_day} bottles.
